com.usc.bill.utility

Class DataMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.usc.bill.utility.DataMapper

  • public class DataMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    To handle data mapping and transformation between different type of objects, for example, to translate a string value to an enumerated value for the type Semester: [SPRING, SUMMER, FALL]
    Version:
    1.0 11/25/2017
    Author:
    WU, Alamri, Stroud

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static org.springframework.core.io.Resource resource
      To load static resource file to map to date/s and vice-verse
      private static java.util.Properties semesterProps
      semesterProps is a file of semester and year associated with start date and end dates

                           java.util.List<TransactionHistory> allTransactionHistory)
        Map the required variables into a bill object.
        Parameters:
        studentProfile - the profile object of the student whose bill will be returned
        allTransactionHistory - list of transaction history to be mapped
        Returns:
        the Bill object
        See Also:

      • getBill

        public static Bill getBill(StudentProfile studentProfile,
                           java.util.List<TransactionHistory> allTransactionHistory,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigDecimal> currentCharges)
        Map the required variables from a student profile into a bill object. This would be the values of the student at the time the end of semester bill is generated.
        Parameters:
        studentProfile - the profile object of the student whose bill will be returned
        allTransactionHistory - list of transaction history to be mapped
        currentCharges - a map of current charges to be mapped
        Returns:
        the Bill object
        See Also:
        StudentProfile, TransactionHistory

        allTansactionHistory - list of transaction history to be mapped

        mapped StudentRecord
        See Also:
        StudentProfile, TransactionHistory
